item.title: Distribution of a common EditorConfig file to Multiple .NET Projects
item.description: Answers the frequently-asked question about how to distribute a common or centralised EditorConfig file, with Code Style and Analysis Rules, to multiple .NET Projects or Solutions without duplication.
